subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Spain is hoping its star will end his less-than-stellar 2011 on a high note, leading his country against the underdog Argentina in the Davis Cup final in Seville this weekend.
snippet: Spain is hoping its star will end his less-than-stellar 2011 on a high note, leading his country against the underdog Argentina in the Davis Cup final in Seville this weekend.
